channel.title: Cisco CLI Basics - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Commands Tell the system to reboot IOS: reload Keyboard Shortcuts Key Function up arrow/Ctrl+P Recently used commands (previous) Down arrow/Ctrl+N Recently used commands (next) Left arrow/Ctrl+B Move cursor back Right Arrow/Ctrl+F Move cursor forward Back Space Delete Debug Tells user details about the operation of the switch Navigation End or Ctrl+Z Global Config > Enable Mode Exit Line or VLAN modes > Global config Memory RAM Stores Running config Flash Memory
